caseName: Hodge v. Simpson
cause: 28:2254 Ptn for Writ of H/C - Stay of Execution

recap_documents.description: MEMORANDUM OPINION AND ORDER:  (1) Petitioner Benny Lee Hodge's Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus   11  and Motion for Summary Judgment  73  be, and are, hereby DENIED; (2) This action be, and is, hereby DISMISSED WITH PREJUDICE  and STRICKEN from Court's active docket; (3) This is a final and appealable order. With regard to any appeal, a certificate of appealability pursuant to 28:2253(c) and Fed. R. App. P. 22(b) will be issued for Claims 4, 5, and 6, an d denied for all other Claims raised. (4) Judgment will be entered contemporaneously with this Memorandum Opinion and Order in favor of Respondent Randy White, Warden of  Kentucky State Penitentiary.  Signed by Judge David L. Bunning on 8/17/2016. (RCB)cc:  COR

recap_documents.description: ORDER DENYING HABEAS PETITION AND AFFIRMING  REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS  for  47  and  60   Report and Recommendations and overruling objections.
